page.title: 03The Information Centre
page.content: To help the public and to provide information, and generally look after the Country Park, there is a Warden Service. This is based at the Information Centre. The Information Centre consists of a large stone bungalow style building with toilet facilities, exhibition areas, a large patio and rooms for use as offices, and a slide/ film area. Constantly changing exhibits include a monthly board. Large permanent exhibits include maps and models showing relief, geology and landscape features. Daily notes are given regarding weather and sightings of special interest.
